title: The Zelenko Report: Joe Biden is the US kingpin of human trafficking, says Ann Vandersteel – Brighteon.TV
cleaned_text:
The Zelenko Report: Joe Biden is the US kingpin of human trafficking, says Ann Vandersteel – Brighteon.TV

Zelenko Freedom Foundation (ZFF) Co-Chair Ann Vandersteel denounced President Joe Biden for being the mastermind of illegal immigrations in the United States of America during the latest episode of the “The Zelenko Report” on Brighteon.TV.

“Biden is the kingpin of human trafficking here in the United States. He is complicit in this in terms of facilitating human trafficking and basically giving away American jobs to people who do not have a natural birthright in this country,” Vandersteel stated, pointing out that conniving with the president is the Secretary of Homeland Security Alejandro Mayorkas.

According to a video played during the show, the American government pre-approves migrants for work before they come across the border and then gives them access to residency.

“President Joe Biden’s historic mass migration is already changing for the final two years of his term. From news drone scenes of hundreds of thousands pouring in illegally every month to this,” the narrator Todd Bensman, a senior national security fellow of the Center for Immigration Studies, annotated as the clip showed a multitude of U.S.-bound migrants from Mexico, El Salvador, Nicaragua and Honduras.

“The millions who set off from distant homes planning to illegally cross the southern border are finally about to collect their prize. But everything is different for them and for potentially millions more hearing about this and coming to do it too.”

From the Mexican government shelter in Calexico, California, Mexico’s Immigration Service will hand them over to their American counterparts for the official port of entry. The temporary legal status papers are already in their folders. Once Customs and Border Protection (CBP) processes them in, they’re all released to begin permanent lives working in any American city of their choice, the short film revealed.

Vandesteel commented that it is looking pretty dire in terms of how big, pervasive and vast the expansion of the border is. “Joe Biden is making this very available and he is ushering people in a highly coordinated fashion to not only get people cross the border and through processing, but also approving migrants for work before they actually come over,” she said.

The host also expressed her disappointment as none of the people pouring into the U.S. are being checked for the Wuhan coronavirus (COVID-19). “If they’re so concerned about COVID-19 and insisting on making sure that all people in America are vaccinated to mitigate the virus, why aren’t they doing any of this to the immigrants? They’re ushering these people into basically diluting the electorate in our country,” Vandersteel pointed out.

According to reports, there are already an estimated five million foreign nationals that have entered the U.S. illegally since Biden took office. (Related: Video shows camouflaged illegal aliens easily crossing southern border wall to enter US.)

As Biden moves to change the populace, patriots in the land are fighting election fraud.

Kari Lake, the Republican gubernatorial candidate in Arizona, is confident that election fraud in her state will be exposed. “The way they run elections in Maricopa County is worse than in banana republics around this world,” Lake told the Daily Mail.

The Republican candidate was commenting on Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich’s office opening an inquiry into polling issues in the county, which includes Phoenix and other cities. Ballot-tabulation issues were confirmed by Maricopa County officials on Nov. 8.

The Associated Press has already called the race for Hobbs, but Lake is having none of it.

Vandersteel said Arizona’s Assistant Attorney General Jennifer Wright demanded that the evidence be turned over before Maricopa County submits its official canvass to the Secretary of State who happens to be “the same lady who was running for governor.”

“That’s right, Katie Hobbs, that corrupt woman, can you believe she hasn’t even excused herself or recused herself after this has just blown up at all of their faces?” Vandesteel said, adding Lake is going to restore election integrity.

Visit BorderSecurity.news for more news related to the millions of border crossers allowed and supported by the Biden regime.

Watch the full Nov. 21 episode of “The Zelenko Report” with Ann Vandersteel below. Catch new episodes of the program every weekday at 1:00 p.m. on Brighteon.TV.

Illegal aliens are now “climate migrants,” according to globalists pushing population replacement scheme.
